label: 白拍子
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A type of dance with song, popular in the late Heian and Kamakura periods, which was performed by a female entertainer to the accompaniment of drum. The term was also used of the dancer herself. [鎌倉時代]
